entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023
